articles.author: Billy Witz
articles.title: Joe Burrow Wins the 2019 Heisman Trophy
articles.description: Three of the four Heisman finalists, including Louisiana State’s Burrow, transferred to their current teams from other schools.
articles.content: Burrow passed for 4,715 yards, second in the nation; completed 77.9 percent of his passes, which would be a N.C.A.A. record; and threw a Southeastern Conference-record 48 touchdown passes against six interceptions. And he did so for the unbeaten Tigers, who a… [+1447 chars]

articles.author: Aimee Ortiz
articles.title: Fire Breaks Out at New Texas Rangers Stadium
articles.description: The blaze was quickly contained and there were no injuries reported, a fire official said.
articles.content:
A fire broke out on Saturday at the new stadium for the Texas Rangers that is set to open next year, fire officials said.
The fire was reported about 2:30 p.m. at the ballpark, which is under construction, in Arlington, Texas, about 20 miles west of Dallas. … [+438 chars]

articles.content:
While military service academies have long competed in college sports, they have mostly emphasized training future officers rather than serving as a steppingstone for athletes seeking a career in professional leagues.
